snippet: Yael Bartana’s “And Europe Will Be Stunned” consists primarily of a video trilogy, the narrative of which concerns a kind of reverse Zionism.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews Yael Bartana: And Europe Will Be Stunned exhibit at Petzel Gallery.
lead_paragraph: Yael Bartana’s “And Europe Will Be Stunned” consists primarily of a video trilogy, the narrative of which concerns a kind of reverse Zionism.
